column4: hello! i have an issue with my laptop(hp hdx 16). i m using 10.10. First - my web cam doesn't work, i even don't see it in lsusb. Second - my fingerprint device does'nt work, i see it in lsusb but fprint demo doesn't see it. Thanks!
fingerprint devices do not bring in security.
is your camera plugged in via usb?
camera is integrated, i suppose it should be connected to usb
perhaps you might want to harden the f*ck up on computing knowledge ;)
the thing is that it worked in 9.10
also read netiquette. You do not just send private messages to people.
yes yes i'm stupid i got it
perhaps your camera is turned off for some reason?
I do not know that model, so I have no idea.
if it worked in 9.10, put in a livecd for 9.10, and find the device...
